name: ExchangeRateService
description: Implementation of the exchange rate service smart contract.

functionDecorators.name: _nylonValue
functionDecorators.description: Evaluates the value of x-amount of Nylon. Requirements: - '_amount', requested amount of Nylon. Returns: - `cUSDAmount`, amount of cUSD needed for x-amount of Nylon - `cEURAmount`, amount of cEUR needed for x-amount of Nylon.

functionDecorators.name: _usdEurRate
functionDecorators.description: Evaluates the current exchange rate of the cUSD to the cEUR by dividing the CELO/EUR-price with the CELO/USD-price. Returns: - `usdEurRate`, exchange rate of USD/EUR.
